Events that occurred on 20 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1954 – J.R.R. Tolkien receives a D.Litt. from University College Dublin.
1962 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 239.
1962 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Alina Dadlez.
1965 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 272.
1998 – Mythcon 29 in Wheaton, Illinois.
2000 – The second Tolkien Thing is held in Cologne.
2009 – Mythcon 40 in Los Angeles, California.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
The funeral procession of king Théoden travels toward Edoras.[1]

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, The Lord of the Rings, Appendix B, "The Chief Days from the Fall of Barad-dûr to the End of the Third Age"
